item.title: Craig add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Craig add a quote by Dave Eggers
item.description: "Here I am Rock You Like a Hurricane." -- Dave Eggers

item.title: Craig add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Only the development of compassion and understanding for others can bring us the tranquility and happiness we all seek." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Craig add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
Craig add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Game shows are designed to make us feel better about the random, useless facts that are all we have left of our education." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Craig add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Big Brother isn’t watching. He’s singing and dancing. He’s pulling rabbits out of a hat. Big Brother’s busy holding your attention every moment you’re awake. He’s making sure you’re always distracted. He’s making sure you’re fully absorbed." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Craig add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Craig add a quote by Daniel Quinn
item.description: "If the world is saved, it will not be saved by old minds with new programs but by new minds with no programs at all." -- Daniel Quinn

item.title: Craig add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Craig add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Craig add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Craig add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Craig add a quote by Chuck Klosterman
item.description: "The Constitution is awesome, but still overrated; it’s like Pet Sounds." -- Chuck Klosterman

item.title: Craig add a quote by Chuck Klosterman
item.description: "I attempted to make a more academic argument about how the Limp Bizkit song “Nookie” was misogynist for suggesting that the protagonist’s ex-girlfriend should inject a cookie into her vagina (or maybe that she should somehow fold her vagina into her rectum — the specific lyrics have never been clear)." -- Chuck Klosterman

item.title: Craig add a quote by Ted L. Nancy
item.description: "I like the Indian casino names - Pechangas - Morongos. They all sound like women’s breasts." -- Ted L. Nancy
